Uses of Class
org.epochx.epox.Variable

Packages that use Variable
org.epochx.epox   
 

Uses of Variable in org.epochx.epox
 

Methods in org.epochx.epox that return Variable
 Variable Variable.clone()
          Variable objects cannot be cloned.
 Variable Variable.newInstance()
          It is not possible to construct a new instance from this variable.
 

Methods in org.epochx.epox that return types with arguments of type Variable
static java.util.List<Variable> NodeUtils.createVariables(java.lang.Class<?> datatype, java.lang.String... variableNames)
          Creates a List of Variable objects of the given data type.
 

Methods in org.epochx.epox with parameters of type Variable
 void EpoxParser.declareVariable(Variable variable)
          Declares the given variable, so that any terminals that match the given variable's identifier will be parsed as that variable.
 void EpoxParser.undeclareVariable(Variable variable)
          Removes the given variable from those that are parseable.
 

Method parameters in org.epochx.epox with type arguments of type Variable
 void EpoxParser.declareVariables(java.util.List<Variable> variables)
          Declares the given variables, so that any terminals that match the identifiers of the given variables will be parsed as such.
